# Museum (Building)
## Overview
**Museum**

**Create** 47 Goods, 5 Influence, 43 Labor, 1 Magic (2,050 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Guard Post (Room)|Guard Post]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Reliquary (Room)|Reliquary]], 2 [[Statue (Room)|Statues]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]], 1 [[Storefront (Room)|Storefront]], 2 [[Trophy Room (Room)|Trophy Rooms]], 1 [[Vault (Room)|Vault]]

A place to display art and artifacts both modern and historical.
